Creating a Useful and Ethical Digital Identity Ecosystem

We are a coalition of individuals and organisations working together to implement and adopt values based digital identity solutions.

Why this is important? Our Values

How we Work.

The Trust Alliance is organised around four primary working groups. Working groups are member lead, and welcoming of new values aligned individuals or organisations who would like to contribute.

Research & Impact

Develop a research agenda that addresses the issues and opportnunities with trusted digital credentials as well as measure and evaluate the impact of the initiative including the development of an Impact Model.

Pilots & Programs

Identification, prioritisation and development of pilots and projects that support the use of trusted credentials and deliver insights and learnings back to the Trust Alliance.

Steering Committee

Chair / CEO of the Trust Alliance, along with core team that guide the overall direction of the Trust Alliance as well as advocate for and build partnerships to progress the adoption of trusted digital credentials.

Technical Standards & Governance

Development of the model for technical governenace of a registry of trusted organisations to enable credentials to be shared.
